documents.document: Also sitting with a @GlendaloughDist gin and @DoubleDutch tonic while editing a blog post, delish!
Also had a lovely evening in the Bernard Shaw with Sean. Maybe one too many jameson and gingers but sure look.
Made chicken Kiev, Yorkshire pudding, broccoli and gravy for the second night in the row and I'm sat here drinking the gravy from the jug..
Praying to fuck that I feel better by tomorrow, the last thing I want to do is loose my two days off. I want to see my friends pls.
I've also watched almost everything I can on YouTube with switching between opening my window then having my electric blanket on..
I've been in bed for 19 hours.. Is there a bug going around becuase my bin has seen more vomit than rubbish in the last while..
Apple juice is so great, I haven't eaten in 24 hours so I'm sure anything would be great right now.
Been in bed all day on a Sunday sucks, Sundays are my favorite days in work. I want to be in work.
People are shitty sometimes.
Why anyone would go on a date when they're with someone is beyond me, like don't do that to a person.. Especially a really lovely person..
Still working, profess is still coming along but I think I need to shred a bit of body fat. Just to get my bfp down… https://t.co/gvUqJ9WRZ7
After the shitty experience with @Airbnb in Brussels I can safely say @AirbnbHelp are wonderful people. Thank you for everything!!
Had an early one last night, slept for 11 hours, just went out to get waffles and coffee before more exploring 🍇 https://t.co/KzMELZx922
@AirbnbHelp I need you to follow my account for me to DM you.
- happened today with getting into our 'apartment' I would feel very uncomfortable and not safe in the slightest.. @Airbnb
@Airbnb; Brussels is fab so far but I am fuming over this host and the lack of communication! If I wasn't with my partner after what just -
Since there's no way to contact @Airbnb directly, this is the only way that my issue may be possibly resolved.
Arrived in Brussels and am very very disappointed and angry with our host from @Airbnb..
Got straight into bed after my shower but forgot to make food and I'm starving but just can't make myself move..
Got 9 things in @ZARA today for €74 quid. Not bad, not bad at all!!
I lost my breasts to a severe eating disorder but before having a big chest was a nightmare, I suppose one good thing came out of it.
Ill never understand why so many women want big boobs, I've had almost DD's, now I'm a 34B and I wish they were even smaller sometimes!!
Among the rolls of 'puppy fat' my abs do actually exist. 😃😃😃 https://t.co/cw5lfORAT7
Still wide awake at 5am after doing so much today I thought I'd be shattered.
Sitting in No Name enjoying my day off before I get into a new blog post. https://t.co/dF6ATHmYF2
Just home from work and the thoughts of being up at 12.30 tomorrow to be in the gym for a PT session is killing me. No, I want sleep.
My boyfriend is honestly the cutest thing ever sometimes I just wanna squish him.
I am excited to try @LemonAndDuke tonight before @Tommedian though!
I've been up since 9.30am, in the hairdressers for 3 hours and did errands around town, it's my day off.... I'm tired.
Make up is on and hair is done nicely but I just don't have the energy to get changed.
The one time I'm early, my hairdresser is running late, typical luck. 👽👽👽👽 oh well, coffee & rice cakes for me. https://t.co/HnMVBXP1Yg
#NowPlaying Heavyweight Champion Of The World by Reverend And The Makers ♫ https://t.co/yTuEkSCwhv
#NowPlaying LoveStoned/I Think She Knows - Radio Edit by Justin Timberlake ♫ https://t.co/zWxFSVUKKo
There is absolutely 100% no better feeling than getting out of a shower into a heated bed and clean sheets.
Very excited to see @Tommedian on Thursday evening in Vicar Street.
Popped into No Name for a class of red wine then to the Hide Out for some cans & pool. Not a bad Tuesday.
As it's one of my favorite places to drink and hang out, trying the food was a mistake.
Very disappointing food in @wigwamdublin today, 13 quid for three measly portions of flavorless cheese puffs and brisket croquettes & fries.
Sitting in my French bulldog onesie at 3pm eating Ben & Jerrys doing my make up for work. New Year's Day goals. https://t.co/wpHvvdCkcC
Not in work until 5pm tonight, so so lovely. It's also New Years Eve so this is going to be mental.
Also booked with @Airbnb for Brussels but it's very disheartening when your host isn't great at communication.. I booked over a month ago..
I am extremely lucky that I have an amazing job that lets me have the lifestyle I'm currently living including travelling so much.
I have so much money saved up now I just want to go and buy myself everything, ergh.
I've been saving my lil ass off for the last few months getting everything together for trips away to Brussels, Copenhagen & Sweden..
I did get a visit from @marcuscomedy though which made the day a tad better. Always lovely to see a friendly face! :')
My poor lungs and throat are in bits, on two inhalers for my asthma and my phlegm has blood in it, fab fab fab.
Being sent home from work two days in a row is not ideal.
- I have NO idea which address BOI send things to.. https://t.co/kRkKCZAl9C
- my old number to the new and then BOI say they'll send a letter with a password but all I'm trying to do is change my address because -
Tried to change my address on BOI, it sent a msg to my old phone number but while I'm waiting for that phone to turn on I try to change -
Thinking I've blocked myself out of my bank account and wondering if it's too late to call @notstelfc and beg him to help me.. HALP.
Asthma really freaking sucks sometimes, my lungs feel so full of fluid instead of air. Gick.
First day back in work and I'm dying with the flu. Great..
I'm supposed to go to Cavan but I also just want to stay in bed and watch Mr. Bean.
NEW BLOG POST - What I got for Christmas 2016. https://t.co/9DGc8Pqmvp via @Louisee_Sarahh
What I got for Christmas 2016. https://t.co/rJhrYysUdA https://t.co/SZCWZiTKOU
I would tag the distillery, and I will once the product is taken from our shelves but for now I can't because it might complicate things.
~ to do with a company who will downgrade our staff and laugh in our face in front of other customers thinking that they're the top dog ~
~ ever again and hopefully, also rightfully it should be taken from our shelves because I, nor we from what I gather want anything ~
~ your own distiller in that company came in and did what he did to us tonight I am no longer selling a drop of your gin/whiskey ~
It's such a shame because now I've lost all love for that company never-mind the product, we pushed that baby out so well and because ~
~ rule number 1 is 'always be sound'!
~ you think it's acceptable to come in and treat us like that. I don't care if you've had a drink or two, I don't care if you're sober ~
~ and is an absolute arsehole who treats people like dirt. I'm here selling your product, we are one of your biggest sellers and ~
It's really upsetting when you love and try to sell a product in your job and then one of the actual distillers comes in one night ~
Ultimate bad day or gym soundtrack. YAS. 💃🏼 ♫ https://t.co/ds9uaf5xBq
An hour in the gym actually does wonders for my mindset for the rest of the day. 🙌🏼 https://t.co/7c0f0ffDW5
Booked our accomadation for Brussels and now I'm on the way to the gym before work. :3
Productive morning even after all that drama.
Why do I do this to myself? My brain won't let me sleep!
Because I've been online screen shopping for the last hour while watching YouTube videos and eating copious amounts of prawn cocktail crisps
I got i from work 6 hours ago and I'm still not asleep.. Why?
All I want is apple crumble but I've no brown sugar to make it 😿😿😿
Because even though I don't look sick, inside we can be crumbling.. Mental pain can just be as bad as physical if not worse sometimes.
Even though it effects 85% of my day to day life it needs to be spoken about especially in work situations.
When I get my new laptop I'm going to start writing about the truth of living with a mental disorder that will never go away..
I rarely stand up and say how I'm feeling to people in work but tonight was one of those days that no matter what I couldn't escape.
Mental health is so draining in general but especially with the stress around work and chistmas..
My housemate is such a babe https://t.co/Gj2OKQ3Rxj
God how I love everyone I work with.. @Pmacspub got turnt up on Sunday. 💅🏼 https://t.co/PwYNfRalpz
I just ordered a TESCO clubcard, does this mean I'm an adult? Even though it's 3.49am..
Took me 16 minutes to walk from work to boojum, order and get my food, walk back and be sitting down.. That's insane! 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼
@BroderickDamien my signal and 4g is usually perfect.. Everything is just crashing today, I'm going to bed 😹😹
Even my signal with 3 is ridiculously bad today.. What is this?
Cannot wait to get a good solid 10 hour sleep before the work week of 48 hours kills me in the next 5 days..
Anyone else with upc or Virgin got no wifi connection? 😳😳😉
So as if Copenhagen and Sweden weren't enough in Februrary, I just booked ridiculously cheap flights with @Ryanair to Brussels in Jan!
I don't know who's won.. Myself or my ovaries.. https://t.co/V9a0ondyEb
I thought I'd cope with blogging from my iPad but it's just not up to the standard I want. Any good laptops out there that aren't €16278218
Need a new laptop desperately because not writing / blogging for the last four months is officially destroying my soul.. Must write.
@marcuscomedy we'll go next week if it's still kegged! :3 if not, tropigamma ham 🤗🤗😍
@marcuscomedy we need to get on this, ASAP! Also, Tropigamma cans are coming! 🙏🏼🙏🏼 https://t.co/l4Z1rCTMhu
Booking in with @GeneratorHostel in Copenhagen in the next week. So excited this holiday is coming together so well. 😍
Popped into @featherblade for date night yesterday and it was absolutely flawless! Drooling for the next one! https://t.co/o1K3Cr7h5P
😬😳😩 @ The Twisted Pepper https://t.co/v4dQ63avGQ
Most FAVE after work delivery! @ P. Mac's https://t.co/5VvO5uIx6N
@marcuscomedy I know, this is why people love me, I'm just too cheeky (charming) for you not to like me! 😁 plus, that €30 beer was so good!
@marcuscomedy also, elvis juice is back in bottles & ruination from stone is back in cans along with the KRIEK Mariage Parfait 🤗🤗
@marcuscomedy yes yes yes! Sounds delish!! 😍😍😍
Copenhagen, @MikkellerBeer & @toolbeer I am coming for you in Feb 2017! Booking flights at 5am is the best time. 🙏🏼… https://t.co/UjTnOG26hD
